snippet: Interpublic Group of Companies, which is based in New York, has done business in Russia for two decades through ADV and will now directly own three agencies of its longtime partner.
abstract: Interpublic Group of Companies acquires three Russian creative ad agencies from ADV.
lead_paragraph: Interpublic Group of Companies, which is based in New York, has done business in Russia for two decades through ADV and will now directly own three agencies of its longtime partner.

headline.main: Interpublic Acquires Russian Advertising Agencies in Long-Sought Deal
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Interpublic Acquires Agencies in Long-Sought Russian Deal
